data.title: Dive In: 7 Best Summer Activities in Grand Lake, CO
data.meta_description: There's no shortage of things to do in Grand Lake, CO. Plan the perfect summer family vacation with these unforgettable activities!
data.text:
While winter is a great time to relax and unwind, we’re all daydreaming of the warm summer days full of adventure.

In Grand Lake, Colorado, the adventures are unlimited. Whether you’re planning a few days or a longer stay, you’ll have plenty to do in this beautiful area.

Keep reading to find out the 7 best things to do in Grand Lake, CO.

1. Spend Time On Grand Lake

You can’t go to the town of Grand Lake without going to the lake.

There, you can canoe, kayak, pedal boat, stand-up paddleboard, or swim in the largest natural lake in Colorado. Explore its perimeters by foot or canoe, scouting the perfect places to fish along the way.

2. Escape Into the Great Outdoors

Colorado boasts some of the country’s most pristine wilderness.

When you’re visiting Grand Lake, you can explore the following areas on on foot:

Big Meadows

Cascade Falls

Coyote Valley Trail

Lulu City Site

Rocky Mountain National Park

Shadow Mountain Lookout

Once you’re there, keep your eyes peeled for wildlife and wildflowers.

3. Explore Waterfalls

Although there are songs that say otherwise, you should definitely go chasing waterfalls.

You can find the hiking trails to Adams Falls, Cascade Falls and Granite Falls in Grand Lake and Rocky Mountain National Park. Pack your snacks, water and sun protection, and head out to witness nature’s wonders.

4. Stroll the Boardwalk

In between your nature activities, stroll the boardwalk.

The architecture of the buildings will transport you back in time to the times of the Wild West. Plus, there are over 60 shops and a play park suited along the boardwalk to keep you entertained for hours.

5. Seek Out Live Entertainment

There’s no need to log into your streaming account when you’re in Grand Lake.

You can find live music throughout the summer weeks at various venues, including the saloons. Be sure to purchase tickets to see a performance at Rocky Mountain Repertory Theatre.

6. Be Around for Summertime Events

Along with your planned, personal events, you can find communal festivities in the town throughout the season.

This includes Arts and Crafts Festivals, the 4th of July Pancake Breakfast, and the Buffalo Day Parade and Festival. If these events appeal to you, make sure to schedule your trip around them to get a taste of what Grand Lake has to offer!

7. Take a Walk Through History

Learn about the local history to have a better understanding of the new place you’re visiting.

You can get your fill at the Holzwarth Historic Site (roughly 30 minutes out of town in Rocky Mountain National Park) and the Kauffman House Museum (downtown). There, you’ll get the details needed to imagine what life was like back in the day.

These Things to Do in Grand Lake, CO Will Create Memories to Last a Lifetime

With these things to do in Grand Lake, CO, you can have adventures that you and your family will remember forever. The options are endless — it’s up to you to decide which activities fulfill all your interests!
